main event: Five people reported seeing two unidentified flying discs in Rome, Georgia on 14 November 1950.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at approximately 2:30 P.M.,The witnesses included the Russell Field Airport manager and a U.S. Weather Observer,The discs were observed for several minutes before disappearing,One disc dropped towards the field before climbing away,An Air Force ATC training plane was in the vicinity during the sighting.
witness description: witnesses included an airport manager and a weather observer
